content: I don't have current affairs knowledge, and i don't have access to the internet. however, in general, the premier league has contributed to the growth and popularity of football worldwide, not just in russia. the premier league is one of the most-watched and most-followed football leagues globally, with fans from all over the world tuning in to watch matches every week. the league is home to some of the best players and the most iconic football teams, including manchester united, arsenal, liverpool, and chelsea. this has helped generate interest in football among russians and other football enthusiasts worldwide. additionally, the premier league has invested in grassroots football programs in different countries, including russia, to help develop new talents and grow the sport. as a result, football has become one of the most popular sports in russia, with millions of fans supporting their local teams and also the english premier league teams.
